description: {"blocks":[{"key":"nm80","text":"Soil bacteria of Saint Martin’s Island modulates gut microbiota and prevents Enterococcus faecalis infection in tilapia (Oreochromis niloticus)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":77,"length":21},{"style":"italic","offset":121,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"frc5h","text":"the marine soil samples were collected from the shore of Saint Martin’s Island (20°37'40.3\"N’ 92°19'22.3\"E) of the Bay of Bengal, Bangladesh","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3jn19","text":"the samples were collected from 6-15 inch depth using an auger","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8016q","text":"immediately transferred to a 50 mL sterile falcon tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c362s","text":"1 g of each soil sample was suspended in 9 mL of autoclaved seawater in an individual test tube ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dhlcq","text":"100 µL suspension from each diluted stock (10-2 and 10-3) was aseptically inoculated on individual Starch Casein Agar (SCA) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":45,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":54,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crms5","text":"After incubation, different colonies were picked up based on their colony characteristics","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pdqo","text":"Individual colonies grown on SCA plates were carefully observed and colony characteristics viz, colony size, shape, color, type and elevation were recorded","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":91,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"euiid","text":"Biochemical tests such as oxidase, catalase, motility, oxidative-fermentative (O-F) tests were accomplished","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Screening of antagonistic activity of marine soil isolates.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"61cqj","text":"Bacteria were grown in Marine Broth (MB) 2216 (Merck, USA) for 7 days at 28°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Screening of antagonistic activity of marine soil isolates.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5n39f","text":"The broth culture was centrifuged at 10,000 ×g for 15 min and the culture supernatant was passed through a 0.22 µm millipore membrane filter ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Screening of antagonistic activity of marine soil isolates.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"206ih","text":"The inhibitory activity of the culture supernatant was determined by agar well diffusion assay","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7udoq","text":"Genomic DNA of the selected isolates was extracted by using a commercial GenJET genomic DNA purification kit (Thermo Fisher Scientific, USA)  #K0721","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qoet","text":"DNA was amplified by using universal primer 8F (5'-AGAGTTTGATCCTGGCTCAG-3') and 1492R (5'-GGATACCTTGTTACGACTT-3'). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akhpc","text":"The PCR amplification condition was done by an initial denaturation at 94 °C for 5 min; 35 cycles of a denaturation at 94 °C for 1 min, an annealing at 57 °C for 40 sec and an extension at 72 °C for 1 min and a final extension step at 72 °C for 10 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjibg","text":"Then the PCR amplicons were purified by using a commercial kit (Thermo Fisher Scientific, USA) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"44rts","text":"16S rRNA gene sequencing was done  by Sanger Sequencing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Evaluation of digestive enzymes activity of the marine soil bacteria.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4dtci","text":"Enzymatic activity such as, protease, lipase, amylase, and cellulose activity of the B. haynesii strain CD223 and A. mimigardefordensis strain SM421were assessed to evaluate their probiotic effects.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":85,"length":11},{"style":"italic","offset":114,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Evaluation of the viability of bacteria in different pH and bile esculin.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4sn1u","text":"The pH of SCA broth was adjusted from pH 3–9. Then, B. haynesii strain CD223 and A. mimigardefordensis strain SM421 were inoculated in this broth and kept for 24 h incubation at 28°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":52,"length":11},{"style":"italic","offset":81,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Evaluation of the viability of bacteria in different pH and bile esculin.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"75nag","text":"The viability of the cells was confirmed by inoculating them onto SCA agar plates (pH 7) by the spread plate method","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hd3e","text":"Bacteria were enriched in MB at 28oC for 10 days","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":34,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43h05","text":"The ECPs were harvested and mixed with an equal volume of ethyl acetate in a separatory funnel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1kij","text":"The air-dried extract was weighted and dissolved in methanol for further use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqvb","text":"MIC was measured with different concentrations of ECPs extracts (1000, 500, 250, 125, 62.5, and 31.25 μg mL-1) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":107,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66lb3","text":"Fish from each treatment were anesthetized with the clove oil (0.05 mL per 500 mL of water) for hematological analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebk5b","text":"Blood was collected from fish using a 3 cc syringe containing 10% blood anti-coagulant (EDTA) inserted into the caudal peduncle region to drag out blood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29iuc","text":"The blood was transferred to a test tube coated with EDTA, and stored at -30 oC until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8h0d1","text":"Red blood cells (RBCs) and white blood cells (WBCs) were counted using an improved Neubauer hemocytometer (MarienFeld Company Germany) under the light microscope (DM 100; Leica, Wetzlar, Germany)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7q2sj","text":"To measure hemoglobin, fresh blood was collected from fish from each treatment and was poured in the edge of a strip of hemoglobin meter before the coagulation of blood. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8u412","text":"Estimation of immunoglobulin (IgM) was carried out by using Humalyzer-3000 analyzer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dvrd5","text":"Gut microbiome DNA was extracted using a commercial kit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c7c97","text":"V3 and V4 primer were used for sequencing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Isolation and identification of potential probiotic bacteria from the soil of Saint Martin's island Bangladesh
title_html: Isolation and identification of potential probiotic bacteria from the soil of Saint Martin's island Bangladesh
